scripts.npm:cache: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* &&  rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.android: npm run android:env && react-native run-android && npm run android:device
scripts.android:env: npm run android:devices && export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/emulator && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools
scripts.android:cache: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew --stop && export PATH=~/Library/Android/sdk/platform-tools:$PATH && adb kill-server && cd ..
scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/remove
scripts.remove:extra: cd android/app/src && rm -R remove && mkdir remove && cd ../../../../..
scripts.assemble: npm run remove:extra && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.apk: npm run bundle && npm run assemble
scripts.pod:remove: cd ios && rm -rf Pods/ && rm Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
